Literature.Title: Variants of self-assembling peptide, KLD-12 that show both rapid fracture healing and antimicrobial properties.
Literature.Author: Tripathi JK, Pal S, Awasthi B, Kumar A, Tandon A, Mitra K, Chattopadhyay N, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1.5% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:3% Killing=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=30±0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=25±0.5µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=30±0.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-427(MIC=42±0.5µM)
